title: It's 23 and no anniversary gift :C
body: Would love to get it , been playing lol for a while C:

replies.body: The day is not over and gifts are still being sent out per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  There are a lot of accounts to gift, so it will take some time!  Hang on until it's all done.

They are still sending them all out. 
I got my skin a day or 2 before I got the icon.

It's possible that they might have to continue sending them out past the 23rd due to the sheer number of accounts they have to go through. 
My friend's accounts and my EUW alt still haven't gotten the rewards yet even though they were played around the 16 or something, so all that you can do is be patient.
same I did not receive the icon

Give it to the end of the 23th, you'll get it! Don't worry :)

I only got my gift last night but I got the icon a while back haha.
